T16D4419b:353b-0: @353b `[?] // sdeb sbyor mnyam pa'i britta yi ge nyer gcig pa
T16D4419b:353b-1: rab byed ldan las gzhung gis dngos su ma zin
T16D4419b:353b-2: pa / ngo mtshar rtogs byed kyi dgongs pas bgrangs
T16D4419b:353b-3: pa'i spyir gyi rnam grangs sa ya gnyis dang dgu
T16D4419b:353b-4: khri bdun stong chig brgya nga gnyis mchis pa'i nang
T16D4419b:353b-5: gses 'bum phrag lnga dang bzhi khri drug stong dgu
T16D4419b:353b-6: brgya go bdun pa na yod pa'i pr'ast'a ras bcings
T16D4419b:353b-8: samgha: shubh'a mi ta he tu notp'a d'a sha yasarba p'urnam kalpa dru mo //
T16D4419b:353b-9: dzny'a na shtsa k'a ru na palla bo tphu llam hi ta soo khya bee p'a kya mmanydza r'i /
T16D4419b:353b-11: # // dge tshogs dpag tu med pa'i rgyus bskyed bsams kun rdzogs pa'i dpag bsam shing //
T16D4419b:353b-12: mkhyen dang brtse ba'i yal 'dab rab rgyas phan bde'i snye ma g-yur du za //
T16D4419b:354a-0: @354a * // sarba sya lo kara th'a dhi mukt'a n'am pa ri p'u ra no nnam sam buddha t'a //
T16D4419b:354a-1: mant'a ra barsha pra we sha y'a dya tram ku su ma: shubham shre y'a mmangga lam //
T16D4419b:354a-3: * // 'jig rten kun gyi mos pa'i shing rta phyur bur 'gengs pa'i rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T16D4419b:354a-4: deng 'dir dge legs shis pa'i me tog mand'a ra ba char du bsnyil/1 /
T16D4419b:354b-0: @354b ming tshig yi ge tshogs pa'i rjod byed lung gi lhung lhung sgra snyan 'byin //
T16D4419b:354b-1: brjod par bya ba don bzang gser gyi bye ma 'dren cing khams gsum gyi //
T16D4419b:354b-2: 'gro ba'i nyon mongs dri ma sbyong byed bsil ba dam pa'i zla gzugs kyang //
T16D4419b:354b-3: gsal bar snang ba'i chos kyi rgyun gsum byang chub lang tsho brtas pa'i bcud /
T16D4419b:354b-4: 2 / thub pa'i mgrin las bab pa'i bdud rtsis rtogs pa'i lus stobs mchog tu rgyas //
T16D4419b:354b-5: bslab gsum gser gyi dra bas gdong mdzes chos kun rnam 'byed mche ba rno //
T16D4419b:354b-6: mtha' med 'gro ba srid las gdon pa'i g-yar dam khur ni khyer ba po //
T16D4419b:354b-7: rig dang zhabs ldan 'phags pa'i dge 'dun sa srung phreng ba byang chub grogs /
T16D4419b:354b-8: 3 / sna tshogs las kyi lag pas ma bdar mkhyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par gsal //
T16D4419b:354b-9: gzhan gyi 'bangs su bskos pa min par thugs rje'i
T16D4419b:354b-10: gzigs pa 'gro la 'jug / bcu drug lang tsho
T16D4419b:354b-11: dar la bab kyang rgyal ba ma lus skyed pa'i
T16D4419b:354b-12: yab // 'jam pa'i dbyangs nyid skye bar dge ba'i
T16D4419b:354b-13: bshes su gsol ba'i thal mo sbyar/4 / beed'urya yi
T16D4419b:354b-14: rgyud mngas snyan par 'khrul ba'i sgra dang bsres pa'i
T16D4419b:354b-15: yab // gsung // yan lag drug cu rdzogs pa'i gdangs las shes bya thams cad snyan pa'i glur //
T16D4419b:355a-1: 'phags snying gi brtan pa 'phrog pa'i mtsho byung ma //
T16D4419b:355a-2: mgrin pa padma'i rdzing du 'jug phyir snyan pa'i tshig
T16D4419b:355a-3: gi mchod sprin spro/5 / ring nas thub pa'i bstan
T16D4419b:355a-4: la phan pa'i smon lam pho nyas bos pa'i mgron
T16D4419b:355a-5: // mi bdag chen po rigs mchog s'a la'i rkang 'thung phreng bar bcas pa yis //
T16D4419b:355a-6: snying stobs bla nas bla mar 'phags pas bde gshegs bka' yi dgongs 'grel che //
T16D4419b:355a-7: gangs can brda ru 'gyur ro 'tshal rnams mi zad
T16D4419b:355a-8: ma mo nyid du bskrun/6 / ae ma snying stobs
T16D4419b:355a-9: ldan pa'i snying stobs mchog gi rtsom pa 'di 'dra
T16D4419b:355a-10: sngon // mig gi dbang pos longs su ma spyad de bzhin rna lung yangs po na //
T16D4419b:355a-11: lhung ba med pa de ni ci zhes phyogs kyi
T16D4419b:355a-12: dga' ma khengs ldan dag / phan tshun 'dri dang
T16D4419b:355a-13: lan ldon mchid kyi rnga ni lhang lhang brdung ba
T16D4419b:355a-14: bzhin/7 / tshul 'di bsgrub la zhing dang dmigs pa
T16D4419b:355a-15: sbyor ba rnam par dag pa las //
T16D4419b:355a-16: byung ba'i rnam dkar dge ba gang de gal te gzugs su 'gyur srid na //
T16D4419b:355a-17: lam gsum khongs su mi chud dogs pas 'jig rten kun gyi byed pa pos //
T16D4419b:355a-18: mi mjed ces su grags pa'i snod 'di ched du
T16D4419b:355b-0: yangs par sprul @355b lam snyam/8 / de lta na
T16D4419b:355b-1: yang byang chub mchog gi sa bon bsgyur min de
T16D4419b:355b-2: srid du // gnas skabs mtho ris 'bras bu zhig gam sdig pas kyang ni mthar gtugs byed //
T16D4419b:355b-3: des na 'khor gsum dmigs pa'i dug med rab tu zhi ba'i dbyings nyid du //
T16D4419b:355b-4: rmi lam sgyu ma'i rtse 'jo la rol mnyam par
T16D4419b:355b-5: 'jog pa'i bsngo ba bgyi/9 / nam mkha'i mthas gtugs
T16D4419b:355b-7: steng 'og dag na rgya mtsho'i rdul snyed kyi //
T16D4419b:355b-8: zhing khams rnams su byon dang 'byon 'gyur dang //
T16D4419b:355b-9: da ltar 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i chos rnga che/10 / de dag re re la yang gdung 'tshob kyi //
T16D4419b:355b-10: rgyal ba'i sras dang slob ma bye ba phrag /
T16D4419b:355b-11: bgrang las 'das pa'i 'khor gyis bskor ba dag /
T16D4419b:355b-12: smon lam don yod byed pa'i dbang por blta/11 /
T16D4419b:355b-13: gsang gsum mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i mdzod //
T16D4419b:355b-14: brnyes pa gang gi yon tan phyogs re'i 'phrin //
T16D4419b:355b-15: yid kyi ngos su gsal bar bris nas ni //
T16D4419b:355b-16: grangs med lus rab btud pa'i phyag bgyi'o/12 /
T16D4419b:355b-17: blo yi bang mdzod phye ba las blangs pa'i //
T16D4419b:355b-18: nye bar spyod pa rnams dang rin chen bdun //
T16D4419b:355b-19: 'dod yon ma tshang med pa'i stong gzugs sprin //
T16D4419b:356a-0: mchod 'os kun gyi spyan lam 'byung gyur cig 13 / chags sdang rmongs pa'i dgra yis @356a * //
T16D4419b:356a-2: bslab gsum bcas pa'i dbang gi rgyal po dag / nyes ltung 'dam gyi nang du bskyur ba'i dri //
T16D4419b:356a-3: gnyen po stobs bzhis bshags pa'i chab kyis 'khrud/14 /
T16D4419b:356a-4: 'phags bzhi so skyes bsags pa dge ba'i mtsho //
T16D4419b:356a-5: phan dang bde ba'i rlabs phreng g-yo ba der //
T16D4419b:356a-6: phrag dog rdul gyi 'tshub ma mi 'thor bar //
T16D4419b:356a-7: yi rang 'dzum pa'i zla 'od dkar pos bran/15 /'gro 'dul kha lo sgyur ba khyed rnams la //
T16D4419b:356a-8: skyo zhing dub pa'i nongs pa mi mnga' yang //
T16D4419b:356a-9: 'jig rten mthun par btang snyoms mi bzhugs par //
T16D4419b:356a-10: zab dang rgya che'i chos 'khor bskor bar bskul/16 / sna tshogs spros pa'i gzha' ris mya ngan las //
T16D4419b:356a-11: brgal ba'i dgon par gzhol bar mi mdzad par //
T16D4419b:356a-12: sngon gyi smon lam la dgongs bskal ba ni //
T16D4419b:356a-13: grangs med srid du bzhugs par gsol ba 'debs/17 /
T16D4419b:356a-14: de ltar bgyis pa'i legs byas de yis bdag / sems can mos pa'i mkha' la bgrod mkhas pa'i //
T16D4419b:356a-15: kun mkhyen chos kyi nyi ma mngon gyur nas //
T16D4419b:356a-16: 'jig rten dge ba'i snang bas 'gengs par shog/18 /
T16D4419b:356b-0: @356b de 'dra'i byang chub 'dod pa'i ko ki las //
T16D4419b:356b-1: gzhi lam 'bras bu'i dge legs yid gcugs grogs //
T16D4419b:356b-2: 'gugs pa'i ched du snyan pa'i ming bzung nas //
T16D4419b:356b-3: bsngo smon tshig gi rgyang glus 'bod la dgongs/19 / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang byang chub sems //
T16D4419b:356b-4: rkyen gcig rtogs dang nyan thos so skye yis //
T16D4419b:356b-5: dus gsum rjes su 'brel par sgo gsum gyis //
T16D4419b:356b-6: legs par spyad pa'i dge tshogs gang yin dang/20 /
T16D4419b:356b-7: chos tshul 'di yi ched du gtong ba'i phyag /'dod
T16D4419b:356b-8: ldan yongs kyi dpag bsam ma brkyang ba las //
T16D4419b:356b-9: mkho dgu ma tshang med pa'i mchod sbyin dang //
T16D4419b:356b-10: sgo gsum thang rer 'bad pa'i dge bar bcas/21 / deng 'dir gcig tu bsdams pa'i gangs kyi ri //
T16D4419b:356b-11: 'khor gsum dmigs pa med pa'i 'od po ches //
T16D4419b:356b-12: zhi bsil dam pa'i rgyun du bsgyur ba'i klung //
T16D4419b:356b-13: byang chub mchog gi rgya mtshor ro gcig shog 22
T16D4419b:356b-14: / de yi rten 'brel snang ba ma 'gags gdangs
T16D4419b:356b-15: // ngo mtshar sgyu ma'i mchod sprin bdag cag gi
T16D4419b:356b-16: / smon lam 'grub pa'i bden dbang mchod pa'i 'os
T16D4419b:356b-17: // // bzhugs so 'tshal gyi spyan lam 'byung gyur
T16D4419b:356b-18: cig 23 / gang zhig thos na sdug bsngal rgyur
T16D4419b:356b-19: // // bcas las // skyob cing mchog gi go 'phang sbyin pa'i chos //
T16D4419b:356b-20: phan bde'i gzi byin 'jig rten gsum gyi blar //
T16D4419b:356b-21: rab tu 'bar zhing yun du brtan gyur cig 24
T16D4419b:356b-22: / yongs rdzogs bstan pa'i dgongs don ma nor gtam
T16D4419b:356b-23: // smra ba'i blo dang ngag gi bang mdzod de //
T16D4419b:356b-24: 'jam dpal gzhon nus byin pa sa skya ba'i //
T16D4419b:356b-25: bstan pa thub pas bsngags pa rgyal gyur cig 25/
T16D4419b:356b-26: thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung gi tambu ras //
T16D4419b:356b-27: bstan la mkhas pa'i bya ba bgyis mtha' ru //
T16D4419b:356b-28: 'tshang rgya 'gyur ba'i lung bstan kun dga' bzang //
T16D4419b:356b-29: de yi lugs mchog kun du dar gyur cig 26
T16D4419b:356b-30: / dpal ldan rgyal ba'i phrin las rgya mtsho las
T16D4419b:356b-31: // rnam par 'phrul ba'i smra mchog nyin mo'i mgon ;
T16D4419b:356b-32: / yongs rdzogs chos kyi rgyal srid skyong ba'i slad //
T16D4419b:356b-33: zhabs pad rdo rje'i khri la brtan gyur cig 27
T16D4419b:356b-34: / so so thar pa 'dul ba'i gzhung bzhin bca'
T16D4419b:356b-35: // byang sems bslab pa mdo sde'i lugs su bshad //
T16D4419b:356b-36: gsang sngags rgyud sde zab mo'i don bzhin gdams //
T16D4419b:357a-1: mang pos bstan pa skyong gyur cig 28 / sgra tshad rig pa'i mda' gzhu'i 'khrul 'khor gyis //
T16D4419b:357a-2: smra ngan bden pa bral ba'i phyogs kun las //
T16D4419b:357a-3: rnam rgyal grags pa'i s'i ta 'phrog byed pa'i //
T16D4419b:357a-4: rtsod mkhas mang po'i log rtogs chom gyur cig 29
T16D4419b:357a-5: / sde snod gsum gyis brjod par bya ba'i don
T16D4419b:357a-6: // bcad lhug spel ma'i rjod byed me na kas //
T16D4419b:357a-7: sgra don rgyan gyi gling bu 'bum bsgyur ba'i //
T16D4419b:357a-8: rtsom mkhas mang po'i bstan pa gsal gyur cig 30
T16D4419b:357a-9: / bstan pa'i rtsa lag dge 'dun 'dus pa'i sdes
T16D4419b:357a-10: // bshad dang sgrub pas sa steng yom yom du //
T16D4419b:357a-11: bgyid pa de la skrag nas me tog gzhu //
T16D4419b:357a-12: stong pa'i brdzu la zhugs snyam byed gyur cig 31
T16D4419b:357a-13: / thub chen rang gi lung rtogs dam pa'i chos
T16D4419b:357a-14: // dar zhing rgyas pa'i gnas su rab bsngags pa //
T16D4419b:357a-15: bod chen sde bzhi dge bcu'i 'byor pa can //
T16D4419b:357a-16: sa phyogs 'dis mtshon yangs pa'i rgyal khams su/32 / bstan la dga' ba'i lha rnams nam mkha' la //
T16D4419b:357a-17: dus su lhags nas sprin gyi 'thor yab bzung //
T16D4419b:357a-18: sva sti dbyangs su len cing chu gtsang gi //
T16D4419b:357a-19: aandha rnyil gyi sil ma 'bebs gyur cig 33 / de tshe gser ldan dga' ma rang gi lus //
T16D4419b:357a-20: sngo bsangs mdzes pa'i me tog rgyan dang bcas //
T16D4419b:357a-21: rtsa ldum lo 'dab myu gu 'bras bu'i tshogs //
T16D4419b:357a-22: smin pa'i dga' ston ci yang ngom gyur cig 34
T16D4419b:357a-23: / yangs pa'i 'jig rten khams kyi lus can rnams
T16D4419b:357a-24: // kun 'byung las kyi sprul pa sgyu ma'i lus //
T16D4419b:357a-25: nyams dang dus min 'jig byed nad kyi rigs //
T16D4419b:357a-26: mun nad sgron me bteg bzhin yal gyur cig 35
T16D4419b:357a-27: / zag bcas sdug bsngal nyid du bstan pa'i 'phrin
T16D4419b:357a-28: // lo zla zhag dus rung ba min pa'i skeg
T16D4419b:357a-29: / sri dang gzhan gyi byad kha sbod gtod dag
T16D4419b:357a-30: /'bras bu 'byin pa'i nus pa bral gyur cig 36
T16D4419b:357a-31: / las dang smon lam log pa'i chu klung gis
T16D4419b:357a-32: // // dbang med bdas te legs pa'i gegs byed cing //
T16D4419b:357a-33: nyes par sbyor ba'i gdon bgegs 'byung po rnams //
T16D4419b:357a-34: byams pa chen pos 'khyud bzhin gnas gyur cig 37
T16D4419b:357a-35: / khros pas gtsubs pa'i mig bsgyur smin ma 'khyog
T16D4419b:357a-36: / khrag gis bsgos pa'i mtshon char 'bebs pa yis
T16D4419b:357a-37: // phan tshun gcod dang 'bigs pa'i mi srun tshogs //
T16D4419b:357b-0: sems rgyud snying rje bas @357b kyang mnyen gyur cig
T16D4419b:357b-1: 38 / bkres pa'i nyen pas lus stobs ches dman
T16D4419b:357b-2: zhing // bza' btung ming nas 'dzer ba'i skad kyis smon //
T16D4419b:357b-3: rdul gyis g-yogs pa'i skra spu gzings byed pa'i //
T16D4419b:357b-4: bkres phongs bskal ba ming yang mi gnas shog 39
T16D4419b:357b-5: / phan tshun brku dang 'phrog sogs lus med ni
T16D4419b:357b-6: ; / lag pa'i brdzu la zhugs 'dra'i log 'tsho
T16D4419b:357b-7: dag / yongs su spangs nas rang rang longs spyod
T16D4419b:357b-8: ; kyis // chog shes mi zad gter la spyod
T16D4419b:357b-9: gyur cig 40 / mdza' bar gyur ba'i 'gro ba
T16D4419b:357b-10: phan tshun dag / mthong na byams pa chen pos
T16D4419b:357b-11: ; kyis // sbrel ba'i 'dzum // so phreng dkar ba'i 'od zer sngon 'gro mas ;
T16D4419b:357b-12: / mdun nas bsu ba byed bzhin gnas gyur cig
T16D4419b:357b-13: 41 /'chi ba med pa'i tshe dang bsod nams stobs
T16D4419b:357b-14: // chos mthun 'byor ba rnams ni gangga'i rgyun //
T16D4419b:357b-15: dkar phyogs zla ba nyin mor byed pa'i 'od //
T16D4419b:357b-16: dbyar gyi chu gter rnams su 'gran par shog 42
T16D4419b:357b-17: / rgyal ba gnyis pa'i chos kyi rgyal srid la
T16D4419b:357b-18: ; / mgrin pa'i bkra shis chos dung 'khyil pa las //
T16D4419b:357b-19: 'chad rtsod rtsom pa'i sgra dbyangs ldir de yi //
T16D4419b:357b-20: bzhed pa'i don kun lhun gyis grub gyur cig 43
T16D4419b:357b-21: / bstan pa dam pa'i lha gnas snying gi stobs
T16D4419b:357b-22: // rmad byung phrag par 'degs pa'i sa 'dzin des //
T16D4419b:357b-23: tshe rabs du ma'i ring nas smon pa'i gnas //
T16D4419b:357b-24: thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa la reg gyur cig 44
T16D4419b:357b-25: / las dbang gser gyi 'khor lo sngon 'gro mas
T16D4419b:357b-26: // yangs pa'i chab srid ri gling rgya mtshor bcas //
T16D4419b:357b-27: rang dbang byed pa'i pho nya dang po'i 'phrin //
T16D4419b:357b-28: bla ma che zhes phyogs kyi bu mos smra/45 / kun dga'i dpal ster lung dang rtogs pa'i bstan //
T16D4419b:357b-29: bla na 'degs pa'i phrin las rgya mtsho'i gos //
T16D4419b:357b-30: yongs su khyab pa'i sde bzhi ldan pa gang //
T16D4419b:357b-31: 'gro ba'i bsod nams khri 'phang brtan gyur cig 46
T16D4419b:357b-32: / gang gi bgrod byed zung gi chu las skyes
T16D4419b:357b-33: // rab dmar dbang gi rdul phreng skyugs pa de //
T16D4419b:357b-34: khengs ldan phyogs kyi sa 'dzin bye ba'i gtsug /
T16D4419b:357b-35: kun las rnam par rgyal bar brtan gyur cig 47
T16D4419b:357b-36: /'phel zhing rgyas par gyur cig 'chi med tshe //
T16D4419b:357b-37: rgud pa med pa'i chab srid mnga' thang dpal //
T16D4419b:357b-38: rnam par gnon du med pa'i 'khor dang stobs //
T16D4419b:358a-0: nub pa med par grags pa'i yi ge rnams/48 / rigs dang stobs @358a * //
T16D4419b:358a-2: khengs pas dregs pa rnams kyang rang dbang du //
T16D4419b:358a-3: rtse gcig 'dun pa'i dmar mdangs mkhur tshos pa //
T16D4419b:358a-4: 'phos pa'i mdzes pa ci yang 'byung gyur cig 49
T16D4419b:358a-5: / chos dang srid kyi phrin las nam mkha'i mtha'
T16D4419b:358a-6: // rtogs phyir ring du so snyam bgyid pa der //
T16D4419b:358a-7: gegs byed mi dang mi min gnod pa rnams //
T16D4419b:358a-8: nam yang 'jug pa'i go skabs ma gyur cig 50
T16D4419b:358a-9: / tshul gnas thos bsam bsgom pa'i 'khor lo yis
T16D4419b:358a-10: // lung dang rtogs pa'i rgyal srid chen po la //
T16D4419b:358a-11: dbang mdzad chos kyi rgyal po mngon gyur nas //
T16D4419b:358a-12: sa gsum bstan pa'i rgyal rnga brdung bar shog 51
T16D4419b:358a-13: / de lta'i byang chub sgrub pa la sdang ba'i
T16D4419b:358a-14: // sdig pas snying nas bzung 'dra'i gdug can rnams //
T16D4419b:358a-15: skad cig gson du rung na srung ma'i tshogs //
T16D4419b:358a-16: dkar phyogs dga' ba'i ru mtshon ci ste sgreng/52 / lugs brgya dpyod pa'i blo gros ba ku la //
T16D4419b:358a-17: 'jam dpal byin rlabs sgeg mo'i 'gram chang gis //
T16D4419b:358a-18: phye ba gang de'i sku tshe las dbang dang //
T16D4419b:358a-19: yon tan rgya mtsho'i dpal la spyod gyur cig / lus can yongs kyi bsod nams khang pa ru //
T16D4419b:358a-20: bde skyid mgron du khugs pa'i 'chi med mgon //
T16D4419b:358a-21: bstan srid lha yi gzhal med yangs po na //
T16D4419b:358a-22: mkhyen pa'i mig stong 'dzum par ma gyur cig 54
T16D4419b:358a-23: / sa spyod mchog gi bsod nams g-yab mo yis
T16D4419b:358a-24: // bos bzhin byon pa'i chos blon chen po rnams //
T16D4419b:358a-25: dge ba bcu dang mthun pa'i bka' khrims kyis //
T16D4419b:358a-26: khams gsum 'gro ba bde la dgod gyur cig 55
T16D4419b:358a-27: / chos sbyin 'di yi las byed mgo 'dren du
T16D4419b:358a-28: // 'os pa'i yi ge dam pa gang gi gtsug
T16D4419b:358a-29: / bab pa de yang skye nas skye ba ru
T16D4419b:358a-30: // // rgyal ba'i gsung rab kun la dbang 'byor
T16D4419b:358a-31: shog 56 / rtags gsum sngon rjes 'jug dang bya
T16D4419b:358a-32: // // byed las // dus gsum rnam dbye 'byed pa'i blo gros kyis //
T16D4419b:358a-33: brda dag byed pa rnams ni byang chub par //
T16D4419b:358a-34: mchog gi bstan la bya ba byed gyur cig 57
T16D4419b:358a-35: / bzo gnas sbyangs pa'i mthar son sku gzugs dang
T16D4419b:358a-36: // yi ge'i rig byed 'dri 'don rko ba sogs //
T16D4419b:358a-37: sgo gsum las kyi 'brel thogs thams cad kyang //
T16D4419b:358a-38: tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu mngon gyur cig 58
T16D4419b:358a-39: / bdag kyang byang chub bar gyi skye ba'i phreng
T16D4419b:358b-0: // rnam gsum @358b tshul khrims dag cing lung rigs dang //
T16D4419b:358b-1: gdams pa mi zad rin chen mdzod bzung nas //
T16D4419b:358b-2: bstan dang 'gro ba'i don chen byed gyur cig 59
T16D4419b:358b-3: / yongs rdzogs bstan pa'i glegs bam phreng ba dag
T16D4419b:358b-4: / gang du bzhugs dang gang gis spyan 'dren mdzad
T16D4419b:358b-5: // nyan dang klog dang mchod sbyin byed pa der //
T16D4419b:358b-6: thog mtha' bar du dge ba'i bden pas skyong/60 / mdor na spyi dang bye brag 'gro ba yi //
T16D4419b:358b-7: mtshan nas smos dgu thams cad mthong ba'i chos //
T16D4419b:358b-8: phyi mar bcas la mi bslu nges pa'i skyabs //
T16D4419b:358b-9: dkon mchog gsum dang bral bar ma gyur cig 61
T16D4419b:358b-10: / mngon par mtho dang nges legs bsgrub pa'i rten
T16D4419b:358b-11: // dal brgyad 'byor pa bcu dang mi 'bral zhing //
T16D4419b:358b-12: gang de 'jig pa'i chos su shes nas ni //
T16D4419b:358b-13: dge ba'i snying po can du byed gyur cig 61
T16D4419b:358b-14: / srid par 'ching ba'i 'khyud po khyod nyid ces
T16D4419b:358b-15: // bdag don zhen la rnam pa brgyas smad cing //
T16D4419b:358b-16: gzhan don byang chub mchog tu smon pa dang //
T16D4419b:358b-17: 'jug pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag gyur cig 63
T16D4419b:358b-18: / nyam thag dbul ba'i tshor ba dbugs 'byin slad
T16D4419b:358b-19: // gtong phod phyag gi dpag bsam brkyang ba las //
T16D4419b:358b-20: lan dang rnam smin re ba'i 'dogs thag gis //
T16D4419b:358b-21: bcing ba med pa'i spyin pa mthar phyin shog 64
T16D4419b:358b-22: / srid pa'i 'dun pas dben pa gzhan don du
T16D4419b:358b-23: // byang chub 'dod pa'i mkhur tshos 'dzum bsu ba'i //
T16D4419b:358b-24: bag yod sdom pa'i k'a shi mdzes dga' mar //
T16D4419b:358b-25: rnam gsum tshul khrims rgyan gyis bklub par shog 65
T16D4419b:358b-26: / thos bsam bsgom pa'i dka' thub gdung ba dang
T16D4419b:358b-27: // gshe dang brdeg sogs gzhan gyis gtses pa rnams //
T16D4419b:358b-28: chu la bris pa'i ri mo ji bzhin du //
T16D4419b:358b-29: ma rmas bzod pa'i g-yar dam brtan par shog 66
T16D4419b:358b-30: / bsreg za rab tu 'bar ba bud shing gis
T16D4419b:358b-31: // tshim pa med ltar rgyal sris spyod pa'i khur //
T16D4419b:358b-32: ji tsam lci la phyir zhing spro ba yis //
T16D4419b:358b-33: de la 'jug pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom par shog 67 /'gro la snying rje shin tu mnyen ldan gyis ;
T16D4419b:358b-34: / lan brgyar dkris nas bdag gi bde dge dang //
T16D4419b:358b-35: gzhan gyi sdug bsngal mnyam dang brje sems kyis //
T16D4419b:358b-36: rang nyid gces pa'i mgo bo gnon par shog 68
T16D4419b:358b-37: / mtshan rtog tshor ma med pa'i zhig gnas dang
T16D4419b:359a-0: // gnas lugs brjod bral rtogs pa'i lhag mthong dag / ya bral med pa'i @359a * //
T16D4419b:359a-2: bdag tu 'dzin par drung nas 'byin par shog 69
T16D4419b:359a-3: / sna tshogs thabs la mkhas pa'i dpung tshogs kyis
T16D4419b:359a-4: // chos kun bdag med rnam par 'byed pa'i mtshon //
T16D4419b:359a-5: gdengs pa tsam gyis nyon mongs dgra bo che //
T16D4419b:359a-6: gzhom pa'i shes rab pha rol phyin par shog 70
T16D4419b:359a-7: / phongs phongs dbugs rab 'byin pa lag pa'i mthil
T16D4419b:359a-8: // dmar dmar ba rtse ba'i tshon gyis byugs 'dra las //
T16D4419b:359a-9: lhug lhug stsal ba'i zang zhing sbyin pa yis //
T16D4419b:359a-10: mang mang skye bo 'khor du sdud par shog 71
T16D4419b:359a-11: / de mthong dga' ba'i 'dzum dkar yid 'ong mas
T16D4419b:359a-12: // bltas te chos dang thar pa'i phan yon dag
T16D4419b:359a-13: / mchid du snyan par smra bas thams cad kyang
T16D4419b:359a-14: // // dge ba'i phyogs su spro ba bskyed par
T16D4419b:359a-15: shog 72 / zhum la gzengs bstod rgod la skyo
T16D4419b:359a-16: // // ba bskyed // rmugs pa ngo mtshar gtam gyis brid byas nas //
T16D4419b:359a-17: don spyod pa yis rang rang mos pa dang //
T16D4419b:359a-18: 'tsham pa'i chos la legs par sbyar bar shog 73
T16D4419b:359a-19: / lam la zhugs pa'i gang zhag dge ba'i blo
T16D4419b:359a-20: // brtan ldan bya ba'i ched du rang nyid kyang //
T16D4419b:359a-21: sbyin sogs brtson pa'i don mthun bya ba yis //
T16D4419b:359a-22: sems can yongs su smin par byed par shog 74
T16D4419b:359a-23: / bskal pa grangs med gsum gyi tshogs zung gi
T16D4419b:359a-24: // rgya mtsho bsrubs pa'i snying po sa lam dang //
T16D4419b:359a-25: 'bras bu'i yon tan cha rdzogs rgyu skar bdag /
T16D4419b:359a-26: mda' lnga'i mun pa kun las rgyal bar shog 75
T16D4419b:359a-27: / sgrib gnyis zad pa'i 'khor tshogs grangs med dbus
T16D4419b:359a-28: // sku gnyis zung 'jug longs spyod rdzogs pa'i dpal //
T16D4419b:359a-29: bden gnyis zung 'jug 'doms pa'i chos rnga che//
T16D4419b:359a-30: don gnyis mtha' ru phyin pa mngon gyur cig 76
T16D4419b:359a-31: / zla ba gcig las ji snyed chu yi snod
T16D4419b:359a-32: // de snyed gzugs su 'gog med ston bzhin du //
T16D4419b:359a-33: gang de nyid las mchog gi sprul pa'i sku //
T16D4419b:359a-34: 'bad med 'jig rten kun du snang byed shog 77 / gsang gsum yon tan mi zad yid bzhin gyi//
T16D4419b:359a-35: nor bu bum pa bzang dang dpag bsam ltar //
T16D4419b:359a-36: mchog dman par ma'i gdul bya ji snyed kyi //
T16D4419b:359a-37: re ba'i shing rta kun nas 'gengs par shog 78 /'jig rten gsum na mi bslu nges pa'i skyabs //
T16D4419b:359a-38: dkon mchog gsum 'dra mi srid gtam gyi rnga //
T16D4419b:359b-0: bden mtha' gsal bas lhang lhang brdung de @359b yis ;
T16D4419b:359b-1: / bdag gi smon lam snying pos lci gyur cig
T16D4419b:359b-2: 79 / bdag cag mos pa'i khang bzangs yangs par
T16D4419b:359b-3: dad pa'i spos chus kun nas bran pa'i gnas 'di
T16D4419b:359b-4: ru // dkar phyogs lha rnams rin chen gdugs dang
T16D4419b:359b-5: rgyal mtshan thogs nas me tog sil mas mchod pa'i
T16D4419b:359b-6: ru // dbus // rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa
T16D4419b:359b-7: mgrin bsgrigs sva sti dza ya snyan pa'i gling bu
T16D4419b:359b-8: ru // dbus // 'bum bsgyur nas // bstan pa
T16D4419b:359b-9: dri med yun du gnas shing 'jig rten bde ba'i
T16D4419b:359b-10: shis pa kun gyis skyong gyur cig 80 / dga'
T16D4419b:359b-11: ldan lha yi gzhal med nas 'phos 'dzam bu'i gling
T16D4419b:359b-12: 'di dam pa'i snying pos lci ba'i glad //
T16D4419b:359b-13: lhums su zhugs dang padma ltar 'khrungs gzhon nu rol rtsed mdzad dang btsun mo'i 'khor gyis bskor //
T16D4419b:359b-14: nges par 'byung dang dka' ba rab spyad byang chub mchog brnyes bdud las rnam rgyal chos rab ston //
T16D4419b:359b-15: sa gsum chos kyi snang bas khyab pa'i bkra shis dam pas 'di na shis pa'i 'bab stegs mdzod/81 /
T16D4419b:359b-16: phyogs bcu rab 'byam mu dang mtha' yis thug pa med pa'i zhing na rab gshegs stobs bcu pa'i //
T16D4419b:359b-17: mchu sgros mtsho skyes dmar po'i 'dab ma 'dzum las 'phos pa'i tshangs dbyangs rkang drug glu dang bcas //
T16D4419b:359b-18: 'gro khams mas par mi 'tsham med pa'i zab dang rgya che legs gsungs sbrang rtsi'i dga' ston gyis //
T16D4419b:359b-19: rnam grol srog gi ka ba tshugs pa'i bkra shis
T16D4419b:359b-20: dam pas skye dgu thams cad bde gyur cig 82
T16D4419b:359b-21: / de skad bdag gis smras pa'i 'bras bu mi
T16D4419b:359b-22: bslu nges par gsung gi rdo rje grub pa min
T16D4419b:359b-23: // 'chi med drang srong bden tshig grub pa'i ngag
T16D4419b:359b-24: gi mtshon cha stong ba rnyed pa nyid kyang min
T16D4419b:359b-25: // ; /'on te sngon gyi 'jam dpal la sogs
T16D4419b:359b-26: rgyal sras spyod pa'i smon lam rgya mtsho'i rjes zhugs
T16D4419b:359b-27: // ; nas // dge rtsa byang chub chen por
T16D4419b:359b-28: smin byas ji ltar smon pa nam yang don med
T16D4419b:359b-29: ma gyur cig 83 / de ltar thams cad mkhyen
T16D4419b:359b-30: pa chen po nyid ma'i gnyen gyi bka' lung spyi
T16D4419b:359b-31: dang bye brag gi dgongs don ma lus pa rnam
T16D4419b:359b-32: par 'grel pa'i bstan bcos 'gyur ro 'tshal gyi chos
T16D4419b:359b-33: sbyin rgyun mi 'chad pa'i ngo mtshar 'phrul gyi phyi
T16D4419b:359b-34: mo rdzogs ldan bskal pa'i bsod nams kyi sprin phung
T16D4419b:359b-35: rgyas par dkrigs pa zhes bya ba'i glegs bam gyi
T16D4419b:359b-36: phreng ba brgya phrag gnyis la bkra shis pa'i rtags
T16D4419b:360a-2: bcom ldan 'das thub pa'i dbang po'i mgur gyi bum pa bzang po las /
T16D4419b:360a-3: lung bstan gyi bdud rtsi nod pa'i rgyal tshab kyi skyes bu chen po //
T16D4419b:360a-4: mkhyen rab rgyal ba nyid las dmigs su med pa'i
T16D4419b:360a-5: bdag nyid chen po dpal rdo rje 'chang kun dga'
T16D4419b:360a-6: bzang po zhes phyogs thams cad du yongs su grags
T16D4419b:360a-7: pa de nyid kyi zhabs stegs mi 'jigs gdong lnga'i
T16D4419b:360a-8: dbang po rnam par bsgyings pa'i khri 'phang mthon po
T16D4419b:360a-10: 'khor los mtshan pa'i zhabs zung nye bar bkod nas //
T16D4419b:360a-11: rnam par dkar ba'i phrin las kyi 'khor los 'chi
T16D4419b:360a-12: med lam gyi mu mtha' gzhal pa snyam byed pa
T16D4419b:360a-13: gang gi mtshan nas smos na mkhan chen 'jam pa'i
T16D4419b:360a-14: dbyangs bkra shis lhun grub grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal
T16D4419b:360a-15: bzang po pa'i zhal snga nas kyis //
T16D4419b:360a-16: yongs rdzogs bstan pa'i dgongs 'grel chen po 'di dag par du brko ba cig byung na /
T16D4419b:360a-17: rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che 'jig rten gyi
T16D4419b:360a-18: khams su yun ring por gnas pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba
T16D4419b:360a-19: sogs phan yon dpag tu med pas sngon drangs pa'i
T16D4419b:360a-21: kun mkhyen bu ram shing ba'i ring lugs dri ma
T16D4419b:360a-22: med pa yongs su dar ba'i yul gru chen po
T16D4419b:360a-23: nyid du ches cher bsngags pa rnams kyi nang gses
T16D4419b:360a-24: bod chen por grags pa'i sa'i steng gi dkyil 'khor
T16D4419b:360a-25: phal che ba dag / chos tshul dge ba bcu
T16D4419b:360a-26: dang mthun pa'i phrin las dang stobs kyi 'khor los
T16D4419b:360a-27: mnga' sgyur zhing khyad par gnam gyis bskos pa shar
T16D4419b:360a-28: phyogs gong ma chen po'i las lung gis bod chen
T16D4419b:360a-29: ljongs kyi skye 'gro spyi'i rje bor mnga' gsol ba'i
T16D4419b:360a-30: sde dge sa spyod chen po bstan pa tshe ring
T16D4419b:360a-31: zhes grags pa'i rnga gsang phyogs kyi kho ra khor
T16D4419b:360a-32: yug dag tu khyab pa de nyid kyis /
T16D4419b:360a-33: ya rabs dam pa'i spyod tshul bsngags par 'os pa
T16D4419b:360a-34: rnams kyi nang nas kyang bla ma'i bka' tshul bzhin
T16D4419b:360a-35: du bsgrub pa de ni ches mchog tu gyur ba'i
T16D4419b:360a-36: lung rigs kyi nor bu dam par thugs la bcang
T16D4419b:360a-37: nas / mkhan chen dam pa'i bka' stsal ji ltar
T16D4419b:360a-38: phabs pa de ltar bsgrub par zhal gyis 'ches te
T16D4419b:360a-39: nas / / dmar ser zhes pa me sprul gyi
T16D4419b:360a-40: lo'i zla tshes dge ba nas las kyi dbu tshugs
T16D4419b:360a-41: nas / / par mdzad / de nas brtsams te
T16D4419b:360a-42: snying stobs rmad du byung ba'i khur gyis bya ba
T16D4419b:360b-0: 'di @360b nyid kyi thog mtha' bar gsum du 'grub
T16D4419b:360b-1: par byed pa'i bdag po'i rkyen ni gong de'i rigs
T16D4419b:360b-2: sras dri ma med pa bod chen ljongs kyi skye
T16D4419b:360b-3: 'gro spyi'i bsod nams dang dbang thang gi rin chen
T16D4419b:360b-4: phung po gcig tu spungs pa'i khri 'phang mthon po
T16D4419b:360b-5: nas / / par mdzad / la / lha dang
T16D4419b:360b-6: mi'i mchod pa'i bye brag bsam gyis mi khyab pa
T16D4419b:360b-7: dang bcas pas phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal
T16D4419b:360b-8: bar mnga' gsol ba'i tshe na chos dang srid kyi
T16D4419b:360b-9: phrin las 'khor lo rtsibs stongs dang ldan pa phyogs
T16D4419b:360b-10: kyi mthar bgrod pa can sde dag bla ma kun
T16D4419b:360b-11: dga' phrin las rgya mtsho'i sde zhes yongs su grags
T16D4419b:360b-12: pa 'di nyid kyi las dbang dang bsod nams gzhal
T16D4419b:360b-13: du med pa'i gser ldan dga' ma'i lto ba yangs
T16D4419b:360b-15: sngon chad gang gis bskrun par ma nus pa'i legs
T16D4419b:360b-16: byas kyi rgya mtsho chen po 'di nyid kyi khur
T16D4419b:360b-17: yongs su 'dzin pa la spro ba mchog gi rtse
T16D4419b:360b-19: bzhed pa tshul bzhin du sgrub pa'i phrin las kyi kha lo sgyur zhing /
T16D4419b:360b-20: las byed rnams kyi mgo 'dzin par /
T16D4419b:360b-21: phyag mdzod 'gu ru bkra shis dang /
T16D4419b:360b-23: dge slong tshul khrims rab brtan /
T16D4419b:360b-24: par dpon gzungs skyabs rnams dang /
T16D4419b:360b-26: de'i grogs ldan pa rmugs sangs sbyin pa rgya mtsho ;
T16D4419b:360b-27: spo lu'i drung yig blo gros rgyal mtshan /
T16D4419b:360b-28: lcags ra'i dge bshes bstan 'dzin lhun grub /
T16D4419b:360b-29: 'dzom thog pa ao rgyan bkra shis rnams dang bcas te /
T16D4419b:360b-30: phyi mo khungs thub rgyas bsdus cha gsum tsam dang
T16D4419b:360b-31: zhib par gtugs nas zhu dag nan cher bgyis nas
T16D4419b:360b-32: stod smad phyogs kyi smyug 'dzin pa brgyad cu kha
T16D4419b:360b-33: yar dang / par mkhan brgya phrag lnga tsam bsags nas /
T16D4419b:360b-34: rnga chen zhes pa chu pho khyi'i gnam lo gsar du shar ba'i zla tshes dge bar /
T16D4419b:360b-35: mkhas shing grub pa'i skyes chen bgrang ba las 'das
T16D4419b:360b-36: pa byon pa dang 'byon pa dang 'byon 'gyur ba'i
T16D4419b:360b-37: gdan sa chen po dpal sde dge lhun grub steng
T16D4419b:360b-38: gi rgyal khab chen por legs par grub par bgyis
T16D4419b:360b-39: pa phyogs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas par gyur
T16D4419b:360b-40: cig / ces pa thams cad mkhyen pa chen po
T16D4419b:360b-41: nyi ma'i gnyen gyi bka' spyi dang bye brag gi
T16D4419b:360b-42: dgong spa ma lus pa rnam par 'grel ba'i bstan
T16D4419b:361a-1: ro 'tshal gyi chos sbyin rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyi
T16D4419b:361a-2: mo rdzogs ldan bskal ba'i bsod nams kyi sprin phung
T16D4419b:361a-3: rgyas par dkrigs pa 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par
T16D4419b:361a-4: grub pa'i bsngo ba smon lam gyi tshigs su bcad
T16D4419b:361a-5: pa gzhi lam 'bras bu'i dge legs yid gcugs mdza'
T16D4419b:361a-6: bo 'gugs pa'i rgyang glu zhes bya bar byang mdor
T16D4419b:361a-7: bsdus tsam dang bcas pa 'di ni /
T16D4419b:361a-8: zhu dag pa bande tshul khrims rin chen nam /
T16D4419b:361a-9: 'byung du rung ba'i yon tan la smon pa'i tha
T16D4419b:361a-10: snyad du ngag gi dbang po 'jigs bral phyogs las
T16D4419b:361a-11: rnam par rgyal ba'i lha dbyangs can snyems pa'i lang
T16D4419b:361a-12: tsho'i sde zhes btags pa'i snyom las pa des /
T16D4419b:361a-13: nam mkha' lding gi 'phur lding la bung ba gzhon
T16D4419b:361a-14: nus 'gran pa bzhin du smras pa dge legs 'phel
T16D4419b:361a-15: bar gyur cig // / yang smras pa /
T16D4419b:361a-16: lhung lhung snyan pa'i sgrar bcas 'bab pa'i klung //
T16D4419b:361a-17: drang srong khros pa'i dmod pas ma bcings na //
T16D4419b:361a-18: skal ldan shing rta'i re ba rdzogs byed pa'i //
T16D4419b:361a-19: lam gsum dri ma sbyong byed de rmad byung //
